durang: 1~Nedar Burujolare Siṛimi chi Siruṅ.~Ginataególaya॥koṅ॥~Kana ṉhapui Siṛimi, kanah ṉhapui Siruṅ,~Baleć misińtańe Chana ginataególoya॥koṅ॥²
2~Sasaṅakan Piḍingire, sunumakan Piḍingire.~Baleć mising tańe chana kitaṕ saṭao tan॥koṅ॥~Ṉochare Dikuṉhon, Ṉhora ṉaṅkirvaićmea.~Misińere murukuṅ nelsenoḱtea॥koṅ॥²
3~Kákasakam tinjarbonjar,~Chekan kilitana jam dinḍaṉhapanum॥koṅ॥²~Kili kam jagar redo,~Nańaḱ kili ² teń kili misame॥koṅ॥²

4~Hesaā mata matalena baḍi mata matalena(ṭik samay rege~Tuyum seṭer akana)॥koṅ॥²~Hesaā mata ² chaba jana baḍi mata ² chaba jana~Sama gea tuyum bonḍo l akana॥koṅ॥²~Ṉale noṛaāre tuyu seta menaḱć(hakaka bakaka tana~Tuyu kakiṛi mea)॥koṅ॥²
5~Misiń Racha Bakara kiṭuṕakan tiruṕakana॥koṅ॥²~Ṭapaṭapa Baduṛi, ṭapa gasarket́॥koṅ॥²
6~Nimiṅ Jeṭe nimiṅ Lolo~Nen Ṉulisakamdona kana gasaroḱ॥koṅ॥~Baleć Kimiń seṭerlena,~Nen Ṉulisakamdona kana gasaroḱ॥koṅ॥
7~Latarayte Jugiṉhon, chetanayte Jugiṉhon.~Koekoete Jugim seṭerlena॥koṅ॥²~Ṉengań goṛe menaḱćrecha,~Ṉapuń goṛe menaḱćrecha,~ 'koye, koyedo jugi nonah koyado noma meh॥koṅ॥²

8~Daḱ do daḱ do tetaṅhi tan,~Lai do lai do rengehi tana.~Nokon kore dudulum daḱ do beṭaoha॥koṅ॥~Chimin saning chimin jiliṅ,~Nokon reja dudulum daḱ do beṭaoha॥koṅ॥~Daṅh do beṭao hametam,~Diri sut́, rugut́ sut́ dah do beṭaoha॥koṅ॥²
9~Munḍa koh rachare, santa koh rachare,~Kuṭura chi muta riṛi hekena॥koṅ॥²~Kana ṉhapui kuṭura, akana napui muta,~Munḍa kore talaṕ ṭaka riḍiṅ hekena॥koṅ॥²
10~Buru bitar Mage, beḍa bitar Mage,~Chekatere Daṛachuń ṉaiumelet́a॥koṅ॥²~Rutu riu ² teń ṉayum mele ḍah॥koṅ॥~Banam cheo ² teń ṉayum mele ḍah॥
11~Neder piṛi ² t akan sari baṅ, kalai ba nerainelaḍah॥koṅ॥²~Gonoṅsati menaḱ rechalaṅ keā ruāi॥
12~Ṉaben dona baleć Bareń,~Rutu tedo, banam tedo nesum rasika॥koṅ॥²~Rutu te do banam te kaben Ṉasuloḱ॥koṅ॥
13~Ṉengań, napui menaḱ redo,~Baṛi daru lidi ² sua riṅ॥koṅ॥²~Nengay, napui bangay,~Baṛi daru lidi ², doṛa he jana॥koṅ॥²
14~Ṉabendoja baleć Bareń,~Kenjar bonjar raja doben beṭa taya chi॥koṅ॥²~Beṭa ṛoliṅ beṭa taya,~Samaṛam ganḍu rinki rakaṕ akana॥koṅ॥²
15~Buru mage chabahana, beṛa mage chaba hana,~Chigo chekan teben tolgoćena॥koṅ॥²~Niha tinge sanaṅh,~Baṭa baṭi burure baṭi gojen ben॥koṅ॥²
16~Nender buru jolare,~Jiki china, sarasanḍi manḍa rakab let́a॥koṅ॥~Kana napui jiki, akana napui sarasanḍi,~Bale Bareńh cha metam manḍa rakaṕ leṛa॥koṅ॥
17~Chia chia chepar Hon, chia chia guturahona.~Haga ko disu meh do bugitana chia॥koṅ॥~Sukuge bano, dukuge~Maḍako bir kore ko bakaṛatana॥koṅ॥²

18~Ṉabendoja baleć Bareń, Burubitar Reaṛi benaniro niriya,~ṉhoromataleeredo, jangimataleeredo,~Magereaḱ Dotidoben kirĩya chi॥koṅ॥²~Kaben kirĩya redo, kaben kejanay redo,~Ṉaben geda balego barey disum tumio॥koṅ॥
19~Chetan pukari chel chopol,~Latar pukari chel chola.~Baṅ lekan naku kiṅ rakaṕe lena॥koṅ॥²~Jĩbiri menahḱ recha laṅ, jibiri koṭouṅ kiṅ॥koṅ॥²~Raba menaḱ recha laṅ, raba koṭouṅ kiṅ॥koṅ॥²
20~Bareń racha kadam daru,~Sankodaru chetanete Daḱdo jorotana॥koṅ॥²~Daḱ do telae ben Bareń,~Sona rupa tiṛite da, do telae ben॥koṅ॥²
21~Jiṛim suku jan redo;~Boṛo reā baṛa napanum baṛa nemańe meh॥koṅ॥²~Jiṛi karem suku jan redo,~Boṛo reā baṛa napanum ṉalom nemaṅiaṅ॥koṅ॥²
22~Chetano ko mag akana, lataro ko mag akana,~Nokonare juṛilang mage misana॥koṅ॥²~Mage misana lang juṛiṅ,~Bala saka nature lang mage misana॥koṅ॥²
23~Munḍa ko racha kadam daru,~Jeṭe tichi lolate moyalantana॥koṅ॥²~Kana napui jeṭe te, akana napui lolate,~Samay bapui seno tanate, moyalan tan॥koṅ॥²
24~Disumedo gule gule, raṅnachi do mele mele,~Disum kochi Bareń ben niatintana॥koṅ॥²
25~Ṉaliṅdoja baleć Bareń~Sirima jeṭe, Ṉote lolo riliaṅ॥koṅ॥²~Ṉabendoja baleć Bareń,~Mat́ko bitar juṅbulae nubul rebena॥koṅ॥²
26~Chetan pukari, latar pukari,~Maena moh nakukiṅ rakabelena॥koṅ॥²~Ṉasulikiṅ ben go Bareń,~Bugin ² jagadare Ṉasulikiṅ ben॥koṅ॥²~Gonoākiṅ ben go Bareń,~Ikoisi baisi kore gonoākiṅ ben॥koṅ॥²

27~Buru bitar mage do, pata bitar mage do,~Dili kulań ben go Bareń, kaji kulań ben॥koṅ॥²~Kaben dili kulań redo, kaben kaji kulań redo,~Baṭa baṭi buru reaḱ baṭi gojena॥koṅ॥~Tole tole buru reṅa tol gojena॥koṅ॥²
28~Niyang tikiṅ napung tikiṅ menaḱ redo,~Chiṭi kireṅ maḍi, nutu dul akana॥koṅ॥²~Niyang tikiṅ napui tikiṅ bang kiṅā,~Chiṭi kire maḍi nutu noṭang jana॥koṅ॥²
29~Chetan kunḍi, latar kunḍi~Doneha chi masala leko chenḍo tana~Kana napui donea, akana napui masala,~Bareń here beneṭa leko chenḍotana॥koṅ॥²
30~Ṉulichuṭukay riya Bareń~Nisir chenḍo do.~Jagada daaḱ riya Bareń~Keḱ ye baṭa do.~Guli tuṭi menaḱ redo Bareń,~Tuyanja lopoṅ tai mea baleć Bareń॥koṅ॥²
31~Ṉengańe Ṉapuńe menaḱaredo,~Ṉuliḍumasu ḍumba, kuda ḍumasu ḍumba nuṅbal nerĩāḱ~Negaṅe napuṅe bangaya,~Ṉuliḍumasu ḍumba, kuda ḍumasu ḍumba,~Numbul goyo natu ḍing॥koṅ॥²
32~Nape disum do munḍa,~Dirisut́ bonj raja dado niji tan॥koṅ॥²~Ṉale disum do munḍa,~Pataa gasar jan redo dado ranjeḍo॥koṅ॥²

33~Hatu kuṭi uli daru,~Meaḍege jo len esu sibila.~Mata somay hoao redo, jome samay hoao redo,~Kagajo sakamere ole kulaeṅ bena.~Kam ole kulaeṅ redo, kam dili kulaeṅ redo,~Baṭa baṭi buru reṅ baṭṭi gojena॥~Heleke teke buru reṅ tol gojena॥koṅ॥
34~Kam toṭ akan reó, kam sangar ken reó,~Laṛata jilum nela rem tabu tabuya.~Nisai sarige chakat́ bano,~Laḍata jilum nela rem tabu tabuya॥koṅ॥
35~Neang napuṅi ṭai kenare,~Bangali doti chaeṅ tega tegaya.~Neang napui bage kiḍing,~Seer lija botoe botoy akana॥koṅ॥
36~Mage paraṕ hobalena,~Nen rechiń nu nuā tehareṅ nu nuā॥koṅ॥
37~Manḍidoko manḍitana, reberebe,~Ṉilidoko chalatana choṭochoṭo,~Ṉichaḱbaha Juḍń do Met́eć jolopi॥koṅ॥²

38~Buddi netoy-ālaṅ misiṅ,~Chiṭi miṭi bangalare buddi netoy ālaṅ.~Buddi neto kere misiṅ, diri lekan se laṭilaṅ nobor ket́a॥~Jaṭi lekan kagajolaṅ nitir ket́a॥~Buddi neto kere misiṅ,~Nende nonol punḍi kagajo disum jari ket́॥koṅ॥

39~Ṉamdona Bareń negam menai,~Ṉamdona bare napum menai,~Sadae jor balego Bareń, chatom numbul rem॥koṅ॥~Nań dona Bareń ṉengań bangae,~Nań dona Bareń napuiṅ bagay,~Sadae jor balego Bareń, jibon jeṭe loloreh॥koṅ॥~Nańonga ṉengań menaḱć redo, ṉańoga naṅpui menaḱć redo,~Sadae jor balego Bareń jiban chatom numbul reh॥koṅ॥

40~Neṭeḍiṅhatanagoṅm bare, neṭeḍiṅh-tanama.~Mihaḍege misim tem neṭeḍiṅh-tana॥koṅ॥~Chabuṛa tańabenago Bareń chabuṛatań ben,~Gelebar doreare chabuṛatań ben॥koṅ॥~Chapa natũi benago Bareń, chapa natuiṅ ben,~Nilabaṛi kagajore chapa natuiṅ bena.~Meḍadaham joroy-hago Bareń, meḍadaham joroyaha,~Chapa sakam nel kete meḍadaham joroyaha॥koṅ॥

41~Buddim neto tan go Bareń,~Binihur nisikulareh buddim ṉetotana॥koṅ॥~Ṭibul bil akanago Bareń,~āikorṭ bagaṅlare ṭibul bilakana.~Ṭibul chetan rena Bareń,~Sona reha kagajo bilanakah naha॥koṅ॥~Buddim neto lereṅ Bareń,~Sonareha pĩsilate nomboratuimeha॥koṅ॥

42~Chetan pukari latar pukari,~Napũi gecha roṛa let́ joṛa Ṉuli bah॥koṅ॥ Dhuḱ si0॥~Baṛay nasitan Bareń,~Nede nende sepeṛet́ baṛay nasitan॥koṅ॥ Siḱ du0॥~Baṛago nemaiḱ ben Bareń,~Tiṛigo chetan biṛiteh baṛagoh nemaiben॥koṅ॥ Siḱ du0॥
43~Surugo sutam dogo Bareń gutuihalang,~Chigo Bareń galańalang॥koṅ॥~Buddim neto tanago Bareń,~Kumpani duhare buddim netotana॥koṅ॥~Nisirakanagom Bareń, suru sutam galaṅ hankan,~Nisira ka nam॥koṅ॥
44~Jeṭe singi seṭerlena,~Koto koto baha lena jenga Juḍi bah॥koṅ॥ Dhuḱ si0॥~Ji, ge, soṛanago metam,~mutut́ mutut́ ji, ge, lalacho॥koṅ॥siḱ du0॥
45~Ṉengań napuiṅ ṭai kena,~Gete gete senehor tala riliṅ ha॥koṅ॥~Ṉengań napuiṅ baṅ kiha,~Gete gete senehor tisaratuḍiń॥koṅ॥

46~Gaḍako nasi ludam baṛa,~Chiminete misiṅ koben jagaray ha॥koṅ॥~Gutui āchim galańa,~Chiminete misiṅ koben kajiāya ha॥koṅ॥~Jahogeh metam jahogeh,~Niju seno ha॥koṅ॥~Jahogeh metam jahogeh,~Jagaratũi ha॥koṅ॥~Kajinatũi ha॥koṅ॥²
47~Ṉengań Ṉapuń taekena,~Bir daru lekań goḍhanakana॥koṅ॥~Ṉengań Ṉapuń bangaya,~Mat́ buru mat́ sakam lekań batariānah॥koṅ॥
48~Ḍinḍa redom jarama redom, Ṉhapanum,~Boṛo redo Ṉhapanum sunum jorotan॥koṅ॥~Non nanam, noponanam,~Boṛo redo Ṉhapanum tuḍunko tuka tan॥koṅ॥
49~Tatań tikiṅ, jihań tikiṅ,~Chuḍhukiṅ bonga tan goṛe, sasang banoha॥koṅ॥~Sasang nakiṅ namean, buluṅ nakiṅ namean,~Chuṭu nagoy nirihan,~Nuḍũi boleahan॥koṅ॥
50~Nender buru reaṛi misingi jeṭe techi, lolote,~Nekelantana॥koṅ॥~Kana napui jeṭe, akana napui lolo,~Misiṅ go, laigo renge, dah go tentaṅ teha~Nekelantana॥koṅ॥
51~Nendor piṛi piṛite,~Hoy ho chire; gama, dudugartana॥koṅ॥~Kana napui noyo, akana napui gama,~Misiṅ here horen senotan, hoyo dudugar॥koṅ॥
52~Buido senotan Bareń,~Ṉuli baṛa chetanete buido senotan॥koṅ॥~Chiṭṭi kulai ben Bareń,~Ṉuli mata dipilaṅ chiṭṭi kulaiben॥koṅ॥~Kaben chiṭṭi kulai redo Bareń,~Kuṭi Ṉuli suBareńh tol gojenah॥koṅ॥॥²
53~Ṉale Disum dona misiṅ,~Jol beṛa gea misiṅ jolajagada॥koṅ॥॥~Nape Disumdoja misiṅ,~Rugut́ beṛa gea misiṅ ṭekora geaha॥koṅ॥
54~Kuda nikir danḍika, chilikay,~Chili biliha kaben baṅṛasi॥koṅ॥~Daru chetan cheṅṛe menaḱć, koto-kotoy,~Chal baṛana, kaben toṭiha॥koṅ॥

55~Dah do dah do, tentaṅ hintan,~Laido, laido, rengehiṅ tan,~Chimin saning reha repeṛeh, dahado namoha॥koṅ॥²~Dah do namohago Bareń,~Raja kore pukuri dai do namoha॥koṅ॥~Rani kore bandelare dah do namo ha~Nihatih geh sanaṅiṅ,~Chakatiṅ geh mohanĩya,~Raja kore pukuri dah do ranjet́ jan॥koṅ॥~Rani kore bandela dah do ranjet́ jan॥koṅ॥~(Bareń go) chimin mate seteṅ ha dah do ranjet́ jan॥koṅ॥~Nesai sari, bah pari, chimin mate seteńa dahado~Ranjet́ jan॥koṅ॥

56~Chetan pukuri, latar pukari,~Pan sakamdoja bare lodobekena॥koṅ॥~Diku non tan recham, pan dom jojoma॥koṅ॥~Raja non tan recham, pan dom jojoma॥koṅ॥॥~Nesai sari, bapari diku non tan rechama~Pan dom jojoma॥koṅ॥

57~Nengań, napũy, menaḱć redo,~Rumatulay, rumatulay, kaji seṭerah॥koṅ॥~Nengań, napũy, bangaya,~Rum tulay, rumatulay, kaji banoha॥koṅ॥~Rumatulay, rumatulay kaji banoha॥koṅ॥~Nehasari, kenajah, baleć Bareń॥koṅ॥~Bapari, kenajai baleć Bareń॥

58~Ṉamdoja munḍa nera,~Buru diri, noharado kam sesenah॥koṅ॥~Saiu saga, noharado kam sesenah॥~Nengam, napum, taekena,~Buru diri noharadom nuja pachuṛa॥koṅ॥~Saiu saga noharadom, niraja sesenah॥koṅ॥~Nesari kena jah baleć Bareń॥koṅ॥~Bahapari kena jah ḍula misiṅ॥koṅ॥

59~Meaḍege baleć Bareń, kinjiri raja,~Bheṭa beṭa teben dira dirana॥koṅ॥~Bheṭa kiṅ chibin, kaben beṭakiṅ॥koṅ॥~Samaṛom ganḍu rikiṅ rakabejanah॥koṅ॥~Nesai, sari, bahapari,~Samaṛom ganḍu rikiṅ rakabejana॥
60~Tuuṉhonko turuia-turuia,~Segaṉhonko moṛea-moṛea,~Sirmajanum Jaṅchako jomtana,~Ṉotereko le choṭe, leh choṭe॥

61~Ṉabendoja baleć Bareń,~Ber benḍoṅ ber ber kaben nekelan॥koṅ॥~Ṭońa tapa kel, kel,~Kaben nekelan॥koṅ॥॥~Dolaṅ seno hago Bareń,~Dolaṅ biraḍago Bareń~Berabenḍoṅ ber ber kaben nekelan॥koṅ॥~Ṭońa tapa kel kel kaben nekelan॥koṅ॥

62~Banda kotem senoredo,~Ṉoṛaḱn kotem senoredo,~Salukat́ baṛa Bareń, toṭaa darań ben॥koṅ॥~Kaben toṭaa daharańado, kaben beṭa daharańado,~Munḍa koh racha nuṭar baṛayaṅ,~Toṭagosoyaha॥koṅ॥~Kolam lekan, rachare,~Chiṛa bapaḍeh॥koṅ॥॥~Nehasari kenajah baleć Bareń॥koṅ॥~Bahapari kenajah ḍula misĩ.॥koṅ॥

63~Barem racha poṛoso,~Nende sakamlena, punḍi, sakam-jana,~Sabin buginah॥koṅ॥~Chetanete lipi, gohlet́a,~Latarete noyo, gohlet́a,~Johakan lipi, torosa, naṭa natuṛiń॥koṅ॥~Nesai sari, bahapari.~Johakan lipi, torosa, naṭa natuṛiń॥koṅ॥

64~Sohaṛopo, soṛopote,~Ranchi soṛopote.~Gelabar sao, nomineko, bahalejanah॥koṅ॥~Chinḍih koi biḍeha,~Durabin koh neleha,~Danḍa koh tamea,~Jinjirih koh noh raha.~Muka, mukateko, seṭerelenah॥koṅ॥~Bita, bittateko, seṭerelenah॥~Mongol mundi(sihabum) sima reko seṭerelenah॥koṅ॥~Noṛo-noṛoheko panachaket́a॥koṅ॥~Biga bigayahako ṭakayaheket́ah॥koṅ॥²~Nihatihaṅ geh sanaṅhi, chakatihaṅ geh mohanĩya,~Noṛo noṛo-heko, pana chaket́ah॥koṅ॥~Biga bigayahako - ṭakayaheket́ah॥

65~Bakaṛi jangi jangite,~Tiramitia karama kaluṭi natińetana॥koṅ॥~Naloreh chiru sanḍim keche kechenah॥koṅ॥~Tiramitia karama kaluṭi natiṅ hetana॥koṅ॥~Nerame nelangateh, doramo dolaṅ teh, doramo saṅṛi doy,~Karama kokotet́॥koṅ॥~Dharama kokotet́॥koṅ॥

66~Nete putam ranado,~Diri richi, darureh guguchuḍũiha॥koṅ॥~Kana napui, diri,~Kana napui daru,~Jojoko, rumbulayareh guguchuḍuṅiha॥koṅ॥~Ṉuli koh rumbũlay reh guguchuḍũiha.~Bareń honaṅ menaḱć redo, toṭe gasar meha chahe diri putam॥koṅ॥~Tere goso meha, chahe, daru putam॥koṅ॥~Nehasari kena jah baleć Bareń॥koṅ॥~Bahapari kena jah ḍula misiṅ॥koṅ॥
67~Disumedo gule, gule, rajedo mele mele,~Disum chire, Bareńom nihatiń tan॥koṅ॥~Neṅhaṅ menaḱ recha Bareń,~Disumedo Bareń goy tinulemeha॥koṅ॥~Napuṅ menaḱ recha Bareń,~Rajedo Bareńoy kulehemeha॥koṅ॥

68~Bale singi tikin jana,~Bale Chanḍuḱ ponai jana,~Nukurihatań Siṅgbonga, seday Ṉapuń do॥koṅ॥~Nukurihatań Siṅgbonga, seday Ṉengań doh॥~Chuilah kiṅ-senoy hana, chuilabano,~Nida reha kumu rikiṅ bageh ket́ीhaṅ ha॥koṅ॥~Bheṭa kiń gehań metam,~Tebah kiṅh, gehań metam,~Bheṭayan somayareh, seday Ṉapuń menateh tiṛiṅ sabiha॥koṅ॥~Tebayan dipilire, seday Ṉengań menete kaḍhań sabiha koṅ॥~Nehasari kena jah baleć misiṅ॥koṅ॥~Bahapari kena jah ḍula misiṅ॥
69~Bale redo, ḍula redo, dubi kuṭi,~Jobarah leka sayatem nehalaha॥koṅ॥~Nara jaṉań, daru jaṉań, kudako,~Nikiradanḍika lekam chemer chemera॥koṅ॥
70~Jonom ken, nengado,~Jonom ken napudo,~Chimin saning, sirima sorogeriha॥koṅ॥²~Dukureho bangaya.~Suku reho bangaya,~(Siṅgbonga)~Saro, barohay, bakaṛatana॥koṅ॥~Kapajitana॥koṅ॥
71~Buru Disum noṛoko,~Sarajom baṛa teko baṛanakanah॥koṅ॥~Piṛi Disum noṛoko,~Bokom baṛa tirasi bisi teko baṛa naka na॥koṅ॥
72~Hora ko natom tiril sakam,~Nindi kote bangala kote kapajitana॥koṅ॥~Puti sakam saban koṛa, neṅnde chatom saban koṛa,~Nenga, napu, kajido chuilam manatiṅ॥koṅ॥
73~Ṉeram ṉagutan Bareń,~Risarisa Bohoḱan Ṉeram ṉagutan॥koṅ॥~Kań bodolena Bareń~Risarisa Bohoḱan Ṉerare kań bodolen॥koṅ॥~Juḍi menaḱćahago Bareń,~Nendenende Sepeṛet́ Juḍi menaḱća॥koṅ॥
74~Ṉegań Ṉapuń nohaṛare,~Sukulachi, balabal akanãy nituhan॥koṅ॥~Bala saka ṉoṛaḱ do,~Salaṭiki noṛado,~Sengelako tiṅheha,~Nisu sukulah॥॥koṅ॥~Sengelako tiṅheha,~Nisu bal bal॥koṅ॥
75~Hesa mata, matalena,~Baṛi mata matalena,~Ṭik somay reja tuihum seṭerele nah॥koṅ॥~Hesa mata chaba jana,~Baṛi mata chaba jana,~Samageja tuihum bonḍolekena॥ko॥

262~Juḍiń heko gatiṅ heko, nimin bugin banam saṛitan,~Rutu saṛitan॥koṅ॥.~Nimin bugin, banam saṛitan, Rutu saṛitana..~Juḍing goh, nirajol, nirajol nakaṛado kalaṅ~Boloha॥koṅ॥~Juḍing goh, nirajol nirajol nakaṛado kalaṅ boloha..~Kita jol kita jol donago, Juḍiń kalaṅ sabanah॥koṅ॥~Kita jol, kita jol donago Juḍiń, kalaṅ sabanaha..

266~Nender buru johalare, Juḍi tena naralen, Juḍi nepeḍom ॥॥koṅ॥~Juḍi tena naralen Juḍi nepeḍoma.I~Isu saṛi ha koṅ,~Juḍi Rutu baleć reh nisu saṛiha॥koṅ॥~Juḍi Rutu balereh nisu saṛiha॥.~Buru rikiṅ ṉoroṅhe, buru rumoloha॥koṅ॥~Beṛa rikiṅ ṉoroṅhe beṛa rumoloha.~Aesai goṛe bahapari, mukabitta aepenḍom Rutu reja,~Bareńo jibon senoyahan॥koṅ॥~Mukabitta aepenḍom Rutu reja Bareńo jibon senoyahana

267~Chanḍuḱ ko do Chanḍuḱ koh,~Ṉipil kodo Ṉipil koh,~Jojo sakam batariko jonomakanah॥koṅ॥~Jojo sakam batariko jonomakanaha..~Nimin jeṭe, nimin lolo,~Chetanere koh jonomakanah॥koṅ॥²~Disum tabu jayapal siṅh, banachab ruṛay ben॥koṅ॥~Lele koh leka buh nuḍin recha, Gaḍa toloha॥koṅ॥~Lele koh leka buh Juḍin recha, buru rapuḍoha.॥koṅ॥~Kabu chakaḍoh Bareń, hesa sakam, pan sakam, kabu~Jojo mah॥koṅ॥~Hesa sakam, pan sakam kabu jojomaha..~Tiril sakam biṛi redo kabu chakaḍoh॥koṅ॥~Tiril sakam biṛi redo kabu chakaḍoha..

268~Dinḍa redom, jarama redom, Rutu, banam lagit́ Bareń~Dinagem senoha॥koṅ॥~Rutu banam lagit́ Bareń dinagem senoha॥~Rutu tedo, banam tedo, kaben nasuloh॥koṅ॥~Rutu tedo, banam tedo, kaben nasuloha..~Mit́ bitta note Bareń kara somaneh ben॥koṅ॥~Mit́ bitta note Bareń kara somaneh bena..~Karago soman tarem bare,~Din munḍi, bochor munḍi dinagem jomeha.॥koṅ॥

269~Nai kodope naikih tana,~Munḍa dope munḍa tana,~Nape ṉoṛaḱ korena Bareń ṉańadoy dasinah॥koṅ॥~Nape ṉoṛaḱ korena Bareń, ṉańadoń dasinaha..~Kape dasiṅ reho Bareń, munḍa kore talab ṭaka doha~Kań retap peh॥koṅ॥~Munḍa kore talaṕ ṭaka do kań reaḱ peha..~ā̃y doń dasinah Bareń, jibon nasul Manḍi,~Lagit́ ṉań doń dasinah॥koṅ॥~Jibon nasul Manḍi lagit́, ṉań doń dasinah..

270~Leṅ leṅ daru re, bore bore daru re, nola gecha Balańem~Chakaḍatu ḍiń॥. 271~Buru Disum nohaṛoko,~Maṭa sura jom teko lepe ḍore tan॥ ko॥~Maṭa sura jom teko lepe ḍore tana..~Piṛi Disum Kuṛi koh,~Leper naṛa jom teko lamaka lanḍuṅ tan॥koṅ॥~Leper naṛa jom teko lamaka lanḍuṅ tan॥

272~Sida sida do Juḍiń,~Maṭi hare dumur daa lekam kaji kapaji॥~Maṭi hare dumar dat lekam kaji kapaji॥~Nimir gapa dogo Juḍiń,~Neṭaa noṛo kaji telaṅ kecheṛatana ॥ ko॥~Neṭaa noṛo kaji telaṅ kecheṛatanahaI.~Namachi nayar seno tan,~Nańachi chanaṕ seno tana~Sorogaredo musiṅ dolaṅ bepeṭageha॥koṅ॥~Bepeṭayahan somay redo, sida Juḍĩmenate tiṛireh sabińa~Meh॥koṅ॥~Sida Juḍiń menete johar telań meh॥koṅ॥~Sida Juḍi menete johar telań meh॥

274~Mage tanay menete,~Poroṕ tanay menete,~Nape natu mage nelate ṉań doń nijulen॥koṅ॥.~Nape natu mage nelate ṉań doy nijulena..~Maile gele batari Kuṛi,~Gulab baṛa, jungut́ jungut́,~Namage nel nelete, niṅ doń seṭer len.॥koṅ॥~Namage nel nelete, niṅ doń seṭer lena..~Kadal sakam gipal gopol,~Saru sakam jur jur,~Ganga Gaḍa naku lekam gial goyola॥koṅ॥~Ganga Gaḍa naku lekam gial goyola..~Marachi mata jungut́ jungut́,~āṭal baṛa sapa Kuṛi,~Pukuri kuṭi kot lekam dingaṕ, dongobah॥koṅ॥~Pukuri kuṭi kot lekam dingab, dongoaha..

294~Meḍado jujulaṅ gatiṅ,~Mocha chetan juluṕ juluṕ meḍado jujulaṅ॥koṅ॥~Mocha chetan juluṕ juluṕ meḍado jujulaṅ..~Nisu cha-chakat́ gatiṅ,~Lutur latar, sona, sumere nisu cha-chakaḍa.॥koṅ॥~Lutur latar, sona sumere nisu cha-chakaḍa..~Kalaṅ jarenah gatiṅ, mocha chetan juluṕ, juluṕ, kalaṅ~Jarenah॥koṅ॥~Kalaṅ chakaḍen Juḍiń, lutur latar, sona sumere kalaṅ~Chakaḍen॥koṅ॥~Karem chakaḍi Balań, sului ṭope gũṛa teh karema~Chakaḍiṅ॥koṅ॥~Ḍuki pasir nandu teh, karem jarińa॥koṅ॥

298~Nesa sakam durakunḍa, baṛi sakam durakunḍa,~Sarigichi durakunḍam sepaṛikena॥koṅ॥~Sarigichi durakunḍam sepaṛikenaa..~Sepaṛi doben sepaṛikena, sepaṛi nala jota doko~Nemat́ bena chih॥koṅ॥~Sepaṛi nala jota doko nemat́ bena chiha..~Nem doko nemat́ liṅha, chet́ doko cheḍat́ liṅha,~Raja kore nanḍadireṅ tegah rochot́ ket́॥koṅ॥~Diku kore paṛandireṅ kulasu rochot́ ket́..

299~Nako pako birakoh talare, mela meli tanḍire,~Dolaṅ dolaṅ metam redom, tingu tangińa॥koṅ॥~Dolaṅ dolaṅ metam redom, tingu tangińa..~Nape ṉoṛaḱ telaṅārachi, Ṉale ṉoṛaḱ teh॥koṅ॥ ²~Racha korelaṅ manḍa kehare,~Chihamate somodoni chinakoh metalaṅ॥koṅ॥~Chihamate somodoni chinakoh metalaṅ.~Nalo kako ruh laṅ re, nalo kako tam laṅ re,~Nora nako jagarah laṅ kah, disum kote laṅ.॥koṅ॥~Nora nako jagarah laṅ kah, disum kote laṅ.. 522~Naiki kore bakaṛi re, kisan kore bakaṛi re,~Joṛa juṛi gulaṕ baṛa koṛon akana. ²,~Kuṭi muli ko bakai tat́a, kuṭi muli ko jangi tat́a,~Kili mili rasika nuru ki biyuren tana. ²~Sabin baṛa jenga jenga, meat́ baṛa nil nil,~Sabin baṛa gena juṛiṅ, ṉań geṅhaṅ baṛaya॥koṅ॥

523~Naki kenam supit́ kenam baṛa bakai regena sokim bolo~Nakana. ²,~Karem nemoā go saki baṛa nasi somay redo karem nemoāṅ,~Karem nemoā go soki karem nemoār,~Baṛa puṭab somay redo karem nemotara,~Baṛam nemoā soki baṛa goso somay redo baḍama~Nemoāra. ²,~Kako babaṛa, metam, kako babaṛa,~Baṛa goso somay redo kako babaṛa॥koṅ॥²

524~Ṉaben juṛi buru parom, nali juṛi Gaḍa parom,~He juṛiṅ juṛiṅ juṛiṅ misa telaṅha ².~Ṉamadom seno tan juṛim, sani disum kotem bagenatuyeṅ tan,~jiliṅ disum kotem bagenatuyeṅ tana.~Chekan kusur lagit́etem bagenatuyeṅ tana.~Kaji natuyeṅ ben juṛi,~Jagaratuyeṅ ben juṛiṅ chuilam ruhaṛa॥koṅ॥~Kaben kaji natuyeṅ redo, kaben jagaratuńe redo,~Ṉaben chanaṕ chanabete naeṅ doye senotar,.॥koṅ॥~Kaben tingu tagi redo chataḱchomre saṕ meaeṅ, bonḍo ruṛameṅ,~Chatraḱchomre saṕ mey akanyeṅ āṛatar meṅ॥koṅ॥²

525~Mage do senoyan, juṛiṅ mage do senoyan,~Latar disu mete mage senoyan, punḍi sadama~Chetanete mage do senoyan॥koṅ॥~Senoa remam senoḱa Mage,~Joroṅ kore do mage beṭaruṛameṅ.~Sintu kore do mage beṭa ruṛa meṅ.~Bepeṭayan somay redo kale bagemea mage kea~Ruṛa meṅ॥koṅ॥²

555~Buru redo kulako menaḱ Gaḍa redo biko menaḱ he juṛi~Juṛi ² misatelanga॥koṅ॥~He juṛi juṛi ² misatelanga॥koṅ॥~Namado juṛi juṛi buru parom nai do juṛi gaṛa~Paromaen kagelaṅ jagara johar juṛingo॥koṅ॥~Enaka gelaṅ jagara johar juḍingo.~Ṉoṛaḱren nega napuko, noṛaren bau dadako, nuju~Tanay menate toraṅ nora rekoā॥koṅ॥~Nuju tanay menate toraṅ nora rekoārpra.

556~Tiṛim ripiṅ ripinga, kaṭam ṭemeṅ ṭemenga,~Namajuṛi tanachi, kaṭam chapui tan॥koṅ॥~Ṉamjuṛi tanarchi tiṛim sabitana.~Tiṛim sarbi redo soki, kaṭam chapui redo soki,~Ṉamlo teṅ senot songeṅ senoā॥koṅ॥~Ṉamloteṅ senoḱa songe senoāra.

557~Rabi krisi buṭ bage chanabare miḍem boyoṭi॥koṅ॥~Bage chanabare miḍem boyo ṭi.~Latar ota bage saniṅ singi tur nasur menaḱ mitaḍa~Gahaṭi॥koṅ॥~Singi tur nasur menaḱ meat́ gahaṭi.~Maya chabab.aṅ miḍem gahaṭi reaḱ numu gati jagarama~Tan॥koṅ॥~Gahaṭi reaḱ numu garti jagaram tana..~Buluṅ chanab aṅ bagem nitir akan menaḱ garti baria~Buru kiṅ koṅ,..~Nitir akan menaḱ gati baria buru kĩ.~Bos kandaru payate haṛiy akan gati udar bara~Nayate॥koṅ॥~Haṛiy akan menaḱ gati udar baranayate.~Nepa buru terapa buru maraṅ Gaḍa gongore bas akan~Mena gati bonga mandir॥koṅ॥~Bas akan menaḱ gati bonga mandira.~Sebaiṅ sanaṅ menai honaṅ guṛ gotom bano taiya chikaĩ~Sebaiya॥koṅ॥~Guṛ gotom bano taiya chikaiṅ sebaiya॥
